recipe.title: Plum Chili Salsa
ingredients: 1 pound ripe purple or red plums (about 4 large ), diced (about 3 cups)
1/4 cup finely chopped fresh mint leaves
1 teaspoon minced seeded fresh jalapeño pepper (wear rubber gloves)
instructions: In a bowl stir together the plums, the onion, the coriander, the mint, the jalapeño, the lime juice, the sugar, some of the reserved marinade to taste, salt and pepper to taste.
